summary: Nibbles is a unique wolf companion with a body and mind like no other. He has a custom texture and I edited his skeleton so he has a... unique shape, oh and did I mention he loves cocaine?
descriptionHtml:
[line]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/GY18eMR.png[/img]
[line]
[size=4]Nibbles is a unique wolf companion with a body and mind like no other. He has a custom texture and I edited his skeleton so he has a... unique shape, oh and did I mention he loves cocaine? Nibbles has his own custom cave which can also double as a player home, so go crazy. Nibbles is essential, so he cannot die, no matter how much you hate him he will not perish, he also levels up with you so you won\'t ever need another companion...ever.

*IF NIBBLES ISN\'T FOLLOWING YOU OUT OF THE CAVE, FAST TRAVEL TO RIVERWOOD*

[line]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Q1mlMa5.png[/img]
[line]
Installation is extremely simple if you use NMM, so why over complicate it for yourself if you install manually? GET NEXUS MOD MANAGER, IT\'S SO MUCH EASIER! But if you still refuse, just drag and drop the Data Folder into your C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\Skyrim Directory.

Also, check out my other mods: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4831711/?tb=mods&pUp=1]My Mods[/url][/size]
author: billmineface
